section.title: Screenshot Tab
section.para: The screenshot will be updated in accordance with the screenshot settings. In order to reduce bandwidth, the screenshot will only be updated if the screenshot tab is the current tab or if the built-in webserver is running. When the screenshot is being updated, the status bar at the bottom of the window is updated to indicate the current progress. You can manually force an immediate update of the screenshot by selecting "Refresh Screenshot Immediately" from the "Screenshot" menu or by pressing F5.

note.para: Screenshots only work when Glider is attached to WoW.

section.title: Sending Keystrokes and Mouse Clicks
section.para: In addition to displaying the screenshot itself, you can send keystrokes and mouse clicks to Glider while this tab is active. In order to do either, you must first enable that option via the "Screenshots" menu and selecting "Enable Sending Keystrokes" or by pressing Alt+K. This setting will always be disabled when JGlideMon is started in order to prevent accidental key sending.
Next, to send a keystroke, simply start pressing keys as if you were actually playing WoW. If you press the C key, your character info pane will appear.
To send mouse clicks, simply click on the screenshot image. Right and left clicking both work. You can, for example, press the N key, then click to spend talent points.

note.para: Mouse clicks only work while Glider is actively running a profile. This is a limitation of Glider.
